news.title: Gentoo Trustees Annual General Meeting - Sunday, 12 April 2009

body.p: This meeting is the only public meeting the board of the Gentoo Foundation is obliged to hold

ol.li:
Officers Reports
Presidents' Report
Secretarys' Report
Treasuers' Report

Membership Applications - if you have applied and you are not listed below, please remind the trustees
Gentoo Developers
Community Members

body.p: The channel will be open (not moderated) during the meeting unless there is so much chatter it becomes impossible to make progress.
Attendees can help by keeping questions to the end of an agenda item or the end of the meeting - your point may be covered during the discussion anyway.
Do not expect to bring up items in Any Other Business and get an instant response. Calm considered well reasoned emails to the trustees or opening a bug are the best ways to bring up new ideas.
The meeting will be logged and both the full log and a summary of decisions will be made publicaly available
